title: Successful login with valid credentials
description: Verify that an admin user can log in successfully with valid Supabase Auth credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input valid username/email and password.
Click the login button.
Verify the user is authenticated and redirected to the admin dashboard.

title: Login failure with invalid credentials
description: Verify that login fails with invalid username/email or password and proper error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input invalid username/email and/or password.
Click the login button.
Verify login is rejected and an error message is displayed to the user.

title: Admin can list exhibitions
description: Verify that an authenticated admin can view a list of all exhibitions in the admin exhibition page.

steps.description: Login as an admin user.
Navigate to the admin exhibition listing page.
Verify that the page displays a list of exhibitions with correct details for each.

title: Admin can create a new exhibition
description: Verify that an authenticated admin can successfully create a new exhibition with valid input data.

steps.description: Login as an admin user.
Navigate to the admin exhibition creation page.
Fill in exhibition details with valid inputs.
Submit the exhibition creation form.
Verify the exhibition is created and appears listed in the admin exhibition list.

title: Admin exhibition creation form validation
description: Verify that the exhibition creation form validates inputs and displays errors for missing or invalid fields.

steps.description: Navigate to the admin exhibition creation page.
Attempt to submit the form with missing required fields.
Verify form does not submit and appropriate validation messages are shown.

title: Admin can delete an exhibition with confirmation dialog
description: Verify that an admin can delete an exhibition only after confirming the deletion via a modern UI confirmation dialog.

steps.description: Login as an admin user.
Navigate to the admin exhibition list.
Click the delete button on an exhibition entry.
Verify that a modern UI confirmation dialog appears instead of a default browser confirm.
Confirm the deletion in the dialog.
Verify the exhibition is removed from the list and no errors occur.

title: Admin can list media items
description: Verify that an authenticated admin can view a list of all media items on the admin media page.

steps.description: Login as admin.
Navigate to the admin media listing page.
Ensure all media items are listed with proper details.

title: Admin can create new media item
description: Verify that an authenticated admin user can create a new media item successfully with valid inputs.

steps.description: Login as admin.
Navigate to the admin media creation page.
Submit valid media details in the creation form.
Verify the media item is successfully created and listed thereafter.

title: Admin media creation form validation
description: Verify form validation prevents submission of media creation form with missing or invalid required fields, showing appropriate errors.

steps.description: Navigate to the media creation page.
Attempt submission with empty or invalid required fields.
Verify errors prevent form submission and error messages are displayed.

title: Admin can delete media item with confirmation dialog
description: Verify an admin can delete a media item only after confirming through an improved UI dialog replacing default browser confirm.

steps.description: Log in as admin.
Navigate to media list page.
Click delete on a media item.
Ensure a modern UI dialog for deletion confirmation appears.
Confirm the deletion.
Verify the media item is deleted and no errors occur.

title: Public main page displays featured exhibitions slider
description: Verify that the public main page shows a slider of exhibitions marked as featured (main slider).

steps.description: Navigate to the public main page.
Verify that a slider is visible containing exhibitions marked as main slider.

title: Public main page shows default fallback when no featured exhibitions
description: Verify that when no exhibitions are marked as featured, the main page displays a fallback image or default branding.

steps.description: Ensure no exhibitions are marked as main slider.
Navigate to the public main page.
Verify that the page displays the fallback image or branding instead of a slider.

title: Public archive page lists past exhibitions
description: Verify that the public archive page lists all past exhibitions with correct details for browsing.

steps.description: Navigate to the public archive page.
Verify that a list of past exhibitions is displayed and details are accurate.

title: Public media page lists press releases and media content
description: Verify the public media page correctly lists all press releases and related media content for visitor viewing.

steps.description: Go to the public media page.
Confirm all media content is listed and accessible.

title: Mobile navigation hamburger menu and drawer opens below 768px
description: Verify that on viewport widths below 768px, a hamburger menu is shown and on clicking it, a navigation drawer opens with navigation links.

steps.description: Set viewport width to below 768px (mobile screen).
Verify the hamburger menu icon appears.
Click the hamburger menu icon.
Verify a navigation drawer opens with proper links to main pages.

title: Mobile navigation hidden and full menu shows above 768px
description: Verify that at screen widths above 768px, the hamburger menu is hidden and full navigation menu is shown instead.

steps.description: Set viewport width above 768px (desktop screen).
Verify the hamburger menu icon is not visible and full navigation is displayed.

title: File upload displays progress indicator
description: Verify that when uploading files during creation of exhibitions or media, a progress indicator is displayed to the user.

steps.description: Navigate to exhibition or media creation page.
Start uploading a large media file.
Verify that a progress bar or spinner indicates upload progress.

title: Empty states on main and archive pages show fallback images/messages
description: Verify that empty states on public main and archive pages show appropriate fallback images or branding and suitable user messages.

steps.description: Ensure there are no exhibitions available.
Navigate to main page and archive page.
Verify fallback images or branding and messages are displayed to improve user experience.

title: Image loading uses optimized techniques
description: Verify that images on public and admin pages load efficiently using blur placeholders or skeleton UI to enhance user experience.

steps.description: Navigate to pages with images such as main page slider or exhibition listings.
Verify placeholders such as blurred images or skeleton loaders appear until images fully load.

title: Navigation links do not cause 404 errors
description: Verify that all navigation links including new pages like login, signup, mypage, recruit, and submission direct to existing valid pages without 404 errors.

steps.description: Click on all main navigation links including login, signup, mypage, recruit, submission.
Verify each page loads successfully without any 404 or error pages.

title: Middleware correctly blocks unauthenticated admin access
description: Verify that middleware using Supabase Auth prevents unauthenticated users from accessing admin pages.

steps.description: Attempt to directly navigate to an admin page without logging in.
Verify that access is denied or redirected to login page.

title: Automated build and deployment succeeds without errors
description: Verify that the project builds and deploys successfully using automated build and deployment processes.

steps.description: Trigger the automated build and deployment process.
Ensure the build completes without errors and deployment finishes successfully.
